item.title: 为了生存，英特尔必须分裂
item.description: 才能生存，英特尔必须分散自己的分裂， href =“ https://www.economist.com/business/2025/08/21/to-survive-intel-intel-must-breamb-break-ters-yfer-apt-apar- hre =“ noopener” are =“ noopener” target =“ _ _ _ black”> < 为了生存，href =“ https://telegra.ph/to-survive-intel-must-ins-rbreb-isth-ha-08-21”>要生存，英特尔必须打破自己的分开 Intel一旦设定了技术进度的步伐。戈登·摩尔（Gordon Moore）是其创始人之一，他于1965年预测，筹码将随着分析的一致性而变得更快，更便宜。在数十年的时间里src =“ https://cdn4.telesco.pe/file/njmud2refennluiwyzdb0dl13aua5xph_x9jxavbywk5fyuo1xwwwwb0vpb3b3bwy IW6MO0EZ8X8B8B8EKZLSCJR9NSZUWMY0F6LB6EDXFQDKVTNM65CYF9P-GPSMHBYBJPBBQ-XSXJN8YFIP8YFIP8YFIP8ZWMWMWMWMWQJAPS6JV6OEPW WWBTE_UTA6CXQRGLZBVMVKBMAEYPPRO1B335AAVZ9ZDVMAXSS0OR2HEXKPZQN1WEFZBSHVZYTFZYTFZYTFZYTFZEWH902DBSMIUAUATCQ-W057 _culzd5foyfrbnxtmjj1jes5_irnuruz0pfuvgny6a7oe3i3i3w4cklsvsqpnocnjvxf1z_rhws4yhcjw5o_1w-9obsua.jpg“ /> < /blockquote>
